modShortDescription: It is just a simple 7 Days to Die mod that gives you a colored feedback about the cointainer and door states. It shoud be compatible with other mods.
modDescription:
It is just a simple 7 Days to Die mod that gives you a colored feedback about the cointainer and door states.

It shoud be compatible with other mods, because it is only an simple change of the localization.txt. Scomar tested it with [Darkness Falls](https://7daystodiemods.com/darkness-falls-mod/) and it worked well.

**Supported Languages:** English and German in A18 and now new in A19 all languages supported.

## Changelog

* v1.3: Added missing highlighting when pick-up items in the world.
* New Version 1.25 is ready for Download: Added some new highlighted colors for some pick up and use interactions.
* New version 1.2 for Alpha 19 with all language support uploaded.

**[Download](https://github.com/Scomar82/7-Days-Modlets/raw/master/Scomar82_ColoredConSta-A19.zip)** for A19  
**[Download](https://github.com/Scomar82/7-Days-Modlets/raw/master/Scomar82_FarblicheKennzeichnung-A18.4.zip)** for A18

If you appreciate Scomarâ€™s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.me/Enrico1982).

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17900-colored-container-and-door-states/).
